category.description: Foodstuffs (including beverages but excluding alcoholic beverages) for human and animal consumption; live animals, seeds, plants and ingredients normally intended for use in the preparation of foodstuffs; products normally used to supplement foodstuffs or as a substitute for foodstuffs

vatRateResults.comment: Only selected items - fresh or chilled meat, live fish, fresh or chilled fish, milk, butter, bread and other selected foodstuffs (inluding gluten-free pastries, flour and bread). List can be found in Annex 7 of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax as amended via the following link https://www.mfsr.sk/en/taxes-customs-accounting/indirect-taxes/vat/

code.description: Radioactive elements and isotopes and compounds other than those of subheading 284410, 284420 or 284430; alloys, dispersions (including cermets), ceramic products and mixtures containing these elements, isotopes or compounds; radioactive residues
Saccharin and its salts
Antibiotics
CHAPTER 30 - PHARMACEUTICAL PRODUCTS

category.description: Pharmaceutical products of a kind normally used for health care, prevention of illness and as treatment for medical and veterinary purposes, including products used for contraception and sanitary protection

vatRateResults.comment:
Only selected items.
Exhaustive list can be found in Annex 7 of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax as amended via the following link https://www.mfsr.sk/en/taxes-customs-accounting/indirect-taxes/vat/

Of carriages for disabled persons

Orthopaedic appliances, including crutches, surgical belts and trusses; splints and other fracture appliances; artificial parts of the body; hearing aids and other appliances which are worn or carried, or implanted in the body, to compensate for a defect or disability
Sanitary towels (pads) and tampons, napkins (diapers), napkin liners and similar articles, of any material

category.description: Medical equipment, aids and other appliances normally intended to alleviate or treat disability, for the exclusive personal use of the disabled, including the repair of such goods

vatRateResults.comment:
Only selected items.
Exhaustive list can be found in Annex 7 of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax as amended via the following link https://www.mfsr.sk/en/taxes-customs-accounting/indirect-taxes/vat/

code.description: Printed books, brochures, leaflets and similar printed matter, whether or not in single sheets
Appearing at least four times a week
Children's picture, drawing or colouring books
Music, printed or in manuscript, whether or not bound or illustrated
Maps and hydrographic or similar charts of all kinds, including atlases, wall maps, topographical plans and globes, printed
Digital versatile discs (DVD)
Other
Other
On-line books

vatRateResults.comment: Printed books, brochures, leaflets and similar printed products, except books, brochures, leaflets and similar printed products, in which advertising and advertising represent, individually or together, more than 50% of the total content of the product. Exhaustive list can be found in Annex 7 of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax as amended via the following link https://www.mfsr.sk/en/taxes-customs-accounting/indirect-taxes/vat/

code.description: Accommodation services

category.description: Accommodation provided in hotels and similar establishments, including the provision of holiday accommodation and the letting of places on camping or caravan sites

vatRateResults.comment: Accommodation and similar establishments as defined by NACE 55 code. The specific legal definition can be found in Annex 7a of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax. The change has been effective as of 1 January 2019. Exhaustive list can be found in Annex 7a of Act No. 222/2004 Coll. on Value Added Tax as amended via the following link https://www.mfsr.sk/en/taxes-customs-accounting/indirect-taxes/vat/

code.description: Food and beverage serving services

category.description: Restaurant and catering services, it being possible to exclude the supply of (alcoholic and/or non-alcoholic) beverages

vatRateResults.comment: Reduced VAT rate on restaurant and catering services (only food provided).

code.description: Buildings and building construction works
Constructions and construction works for civil engineering
Real estate services

category.description: Provision, construction, renovation and alteration of housing, as part of a social policy

vatRateResults.comment: Construction of state-supported rental housing within the framework of the state's social policy (includes: delivery of a building or part of a building, including the construction land on which the building or part of the building stands, renovation and reconstruction of the building or part of the building, including construction and assembly work on the building).

code.description: Social work services without accommodation

category.description: Supply of goods and services by organisations recognised as being devoted to social wellbeing by Member States and engaged in welfare or social security work

vatRateResults.comment: Supply of goods and services by organisations recognised as being devoted to social wellbeing by Member States and engaged in welfare or social security work, in so far as those transactions are not exempt pursuant to Articles 132, 135 and 136. (Act No. 112/2018)

code.description: Performing arts event production and presentation services
Arts facility operation services
Museum operation services

category.description: Admission to shows, theatres, circuses, fairs, amusement parks, concerts, museums, zoos, cinemas, exhibitions and similar cultural events and facilities

vatRateResults.comment: Production and performance of performing arts, operation of artistic venues – admission to theatrical performances, puppet theatre shows, opera, ballet, musicals, or other similar cultural performances, and services related to the operation of museums.

code.description: Sports facility operation services

vatRateResults.comment: Operation of sports facilities – only services related to admission to sports events.

code.description: Services of fitness facilities

vatRateResults.comment: Reduced rate only on fitness facilities/centres services.

Vinegar and substitutes for vinegar obtained from acetic acid

Salt suitable for human consumption

category.description: Foodstuffs (including beverages but excluding alcoholic beverages) for human and animal consumption; live animals, seeds, plants and ingredients normally intended for use in the preparation of foodstuffs; products normally used to supplement foodstuffs or as a substitute for foodstuffs

vatRateResults.comment: All foodstuffs except the selected items taxed at 5 % rate. These are goods primarily intended for human consumption or for the production of goods suitable for human consumption.

code.description: Electrical energy
Food and beverage serving services

category.description: Restaurant and catering services, it being possible to exclude the supply of (alcoholic and/or non-alcoholic) beverages

vatRateResults.comment: Reduced VAT rate on restaurant services (only non-alcoholic beverages). Alcoholic beverages in restaurants to be taxed at a standard rate of 23 %.
